name: Time to Fight
description:
IT'S FIGHT TIMEGrab a friend or play vs the CPU in a funny fighting game of fast fingers and quick thinking.19 characters to pick from
From killer kitties to zombies to tentacle-men, there are lots of fun wierdos to pick from.9 fighting scenesTake your battle to the arena, castle dungeon, retro computer, tumble-weed desert, soccer field, lava land, fairy forest, and more! Even the bathroom—you can literally flush your opponent down the toilet.


YouTube Let's Play/Reviewers: Feel free to use Time to Fight gameplay in your online monetized videos.
